pkgpins 0.7.0.9002
  • Reference

Get a package's user-cache pins board

Source: R/pkgpins.gen.R
board.Rd

Returns a pkg's user-cache pins board. The board is automatically created if it doesn't already exist.

board(pkg, pkg_version = utils::packageVersion(pkg = pkg))

Arguments

pkg

Package name. A character scalar.
pkg_version

Optional version number of pkg to include in the board name. A package version number or NULL. If NULL, the board is agnostic about pkg's version number. Otherwise, a separate board is created for each pkg version number.

Value

The user-cache pins board belonging to pkg and pkg_version. An object ob class pins_board_folder.

See also

Other package cache management functions: clear_cache(), ls_cache(), path_cache(), purge_caches(), purge_cache()
